title: Massive Welfare Spends Hitting Public Finance, Says Ex Finance Minister: Report - NDTV Profit
content: Massive Welfare Spends Hitting Public Finance, Says Ex Finance Minister: Report  NDTV Profit
description: Former finance minister Yashwant Sinha on Sunday said that huge expenditure on welfare schemes by the government has severely impacted the public finances, which are currently in a mess with fiscal deficit touching abnormally high levels.
